data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 1, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! Fluminense have got their heads in front thanks to a Dodi strike.
In the minute 3, Egidio instrumental with a fine assist.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Yuri Lima of Fluminense gets in a strike, but is off target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Marcos Paulo (Fluminense) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Fluminense are pushing forward but Nene's finish is wide of the goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 12, Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fellipe Bastos is booked for the away team.
Free kick in a good position for Fluminense!
In the minute 14, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Fluminense.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 17, Yuri Lima (Fluminense) has been booked and will miss the next match due to a suspension.
Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 19, German Cano of Vasco da Gama smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Free kick for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
Fluminense needs to be cautious. Vasco da Gama have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 23, Can Vasco da Gama capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Martin Benitez (Vasco da Gama) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Vasco da Gama throw-in in Fluminense's half.
In the minute 24, In Rio de Janeiro, Carlinhos of Vasco da Gama is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 26, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Fluminense.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 30, Attention is being given to Fluminense’s Marcos Felipe and play has been suspended briefly.
Fluminense's Marcos Felipe is back in action after a slight knock.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense drive forward through Evanilson. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 33, Fernando Miguel is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Fernando Miguel for Vasco da Gama is back on the field again.
Fluminense have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Fluminense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Important block from the Vasco da Gama defence as Yuri Lima fires in a strike for Fluminense.
Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Fluminense's Egidio gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 36, Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Braulio da Silva Machado waits before resuming play because Dodi for Fluminense is still down.
In the minute 41, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
Fluminense’s Dodi is on his feet again at Estadio do Maracana.
In Rio de Janeiro Fluminense attack through Marcos Paulo. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 43, Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Vasco da Gama at Estadio do Maracana.
At Estadio do Maracana the fourth official shows that 3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Corner awarded to Vasco da Gama.
Ricardo Graca (Vasco da Gama) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Braulio da Silva Machado awards Fluminense a goal kick.
In the minute 45, Braulio da Silva Machado blows to end the first-half.
Braulio da Silva Machado has blown to start the second-half.
Ramon Menezes is making the team's first substitution at Estadio do Maracana with Juninho replacing Guilherme Parede.
In the minute 47, Free kick for Fluminense in the half of Vasco da Gama.
Fluminense are coming forward and Nene gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 52, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Fluminense.
Juninho for Vasco da Gama gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 53, Braulio da Silva Machado awards Fluminense a goal kick.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
At Estadio do Maracana, Fluminense are penalized for being offside.
In the minute 54, Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in the half of Fluminense.
Vasco da Gama pushes forward through Carlinhos, whose finish on goal is saved.
Vasco da Gama have a goal kick.
In the minute 57, Ball safe as Fluminense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
Vasco da Gama to take a throw-in in Fluminense territory.
In the minute 59, Braulio da Silva Machado awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Corner awarded to Fluminense.
In the minute 63, Can Fluminense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half?
Throw-in for Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Martin Benitez for Vasco da Gama is whistled offside.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 66, Wellington Silva is replacing Marcos Paulo for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
The away team replace Carlinhos with Gabriel Pec.
Bruno Cesar is replacing Fellipe Bastos for the away team.
In the minute 69, Vasco da Gama awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Yuri Lima with Hudson. This is the second substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
Fluminense make their third substitution with Igor Juliao replacing Calegari.
In the minute 70, Fluminense will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vasco da Gama.
Vasco da Gama push forward at Estadio do Maracana and Bruno Cesar gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Fluminense defence.
Ball safe as Vasco da Gama is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 74, Vasco da Gama awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Vasco da Gama.
Throw-in for Fluminense in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Odair Hellmann (Fluminense) is making a fourth substitution, with Fred replacing Evanilson.
The home team have replaced Nene with Ganso. This is the fifth substitution made today by Odair Hellmann.
In the minute 79, Goal kick for Fluminense at Estadio do Maracana.
Free kick for Fluminense in their own half.
Vasco da Gama have been awarded a corner by Braulio da Silva Machado.
In the minute 81, Goal! Fluminense extend their lead to 2-0 through Fred.
Ganso with an assist there.
Free kick Vasco da Gama.
In the minute 84, Braulio da Silva Machado signals a Fluminense throw-in in Vasco da Gama's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Vasco da Gama goal kick.
In the minute 86, Vasco da Gama's Bruno Cesar gets in a shot on goal at Estadio do Maracana. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Goal! Talles Magno pulls one back to make it 2-1.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama just outside Fluminense's area.
Vasco da Gama's Martin Benitez breaks free at Estadio do Maracana. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Rio de Janeiro.
Marcos Felipe is back on the pitch.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Vasco da Gama in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Fluminense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Fluminense.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Braulio da Silva Machado signals a free kick to Fluminense in their own half.
Braulio da Silva Machado blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Rio de Janeiro to check on Marcos Felipe, who is grimacing with pain.
Fred for Fluminense has been booked by Braulio da Silva Machado and receives a first yellow card.
Vasco da Gama are down to 10 men after Talles Magno has been shown a red card.
Igor Juliao is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Wellington Silva (Fluminense) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
